languages.text: "Кто станет делать такую ловушку для всех без разбора? Для элдари и людей и прочих? Кто враждует со всеми и каждым?"

traits.locale_text: "Но кто станет делать такую ловушку для всех без разбора? Для элдари и людей и прочих? Кто враждует со всеми и каждым?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "But who would set such an indiscriminate trap? One intended to lure in Aeldari and humans and anyone else? Who is an enemy to everyone and everything?"
languages.original_text: "Кто станет делать такую ловушку для всех без разбора? Для элдари и людей и прочих? Кто враждует со всеми и каждым?"

traits.locale_text: "But who would set such an indiscriminate trap? One intended to lure in Aeldari and humans and anyone else? Who is an enemy to everyone and everything?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But who would set such an indiscriminate trap? One intended to lure in Aeldari and humans and anyone else? Who is an enemy to everyone and everything?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But who would set such an indiscriminate trap? One intended to lure in Aeldari and humans and anyone else? Who is an enemy to everyone and everything?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "But who would set such an indiscriminate trap? One intended to lure in Aeldari and humans and anyone else? Who is an enemy to everyone and everything?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “可谁会设置这种不挑目标的陷阱？这个陷阱是打算引诱灵族、人类，以及所有其他种族吗？究竟是谁打算与所有人、所有事物为敌？”
languages.original_text: "But who would set such an indiscriminate trap? One intended to lure in Aeldari and humans and anyone else? Who is an enemy to everyone and everything?"

traits.locale_text: “可谁会设置这种不挑目标的陷阱？这个陷阱是打算引诱灵族、人类，以及所有其他种族吗？究竟是谁打算与所有人、所有事物为敌？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Pero ¿quién tendería una trampa tan indiscriminada? Esto atraería a los Aeldari, a los humanos y a cualquier otro. ¿Quién sería enemigo de todo y de todos?».
languages.original_text: "But who would set such an indiscriminate trap? One intended to lure in Aeldari and humans and anyone else? Who is an enemy to everyone and everything?"

traits.locale_text: «Pero ¿quién tendería una trampa tan indiscriminada? Esto atraería a los Aeldari, a los humanos y a cualquier otro. ¿Quién sería enemigo de todo y de todos?».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「だが、一体誰がそのようなな無差別な罠を設置する？アエルダリ、人類、それ以外の誰彼構わず罠にかけようと思う者...誰も彼も何もかもを敵だとみなしているのは誰だ？」
languages.original_text: "But who would set such an indiscriminate trap? One intended to lure in Aeldari and humans and anyone else? Who is an enemy to everyone and everything?"

traits.locale_text: 「だが、一体誰がそのようなな無差別な罠を設置する？アエルダリ、人類、それ以外の誰彼構わず罠にかけようと思う者...誰も彼も何もかもを敵だとみなしているのは誰だ？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Aber wer würde denn eine so allgemeine Falle aufstellen? Doch nur jemand, der Aeldari und Menschen und alle anderen anlocken will? Wer ist ein Feind von allem und jedem?"
languages.original_text: "But who would set such an indiscriminate trap? One intended to lure in Aeldari and humans and anyone else? Who is an enemy to everyone and everything?"

traits.locale_text: "Aber wer würde denn eine so allgemeine Falle aufstellen? Doch nur jemand, der Aeldari und Menschen und alle anderen anlocken will? Wer ist ein Feind von allem und jedem?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Mais qui irait tendre un piège aussi aveugle ? Un piège destiné à attirer aussi bien les Aeldaris que les humains et tous les autres ? Qui peut bien être l'ennemi de tout et de tout le monde ? »
languages.original_text: "But who would set such an indiscriminate trap? One intended to lure in Aeldari and humans and anyone else? Who is an enemy to everyone and everything?"

traits.locale_text: « Mais qui irait tendre un piège aussi aveugle ? Un piège destiné à attirer aussi bien les Aeldaris que les humains et tous les autres ? Qui peut bien être l'ennemi de tout et de tout le monde ? »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ancak böylesine gelişigüzel bir tuzağı kim kurmuş olabilir? Kim hem Aeldariler hem insanlar hem de diğer herkesi tuzağa düşürmek ister? Kim herkese ve her şeye düşmandır?"
languages.original_text: "But who would set such an indiscriminate trap? One intended to lure in Aeldari and humans and anyone else? Who is an enemy to everyone and everything?"
